channel.title: Nicolle on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Nicolle on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – July 31, 2019
item.description: Truck trans struggled this AM. Kids daycare, Lesa IU, me Bloomington. Gave urine, blood samples before going in. Took boys to swim lessons, Ashley went with, got Frosties, checked out kayaks at Dunham’s, Thorton Park, talked about last visit with Nicolle. Lesa flowers, Dillan TV.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 27, 2019
item.description: Ashley: How come we don’t go to foster training anymore? Dave: Lesa and I got tired and decided to focus on taking care of you guys the best we can. Besides, we kind of don’t have the room for another foster kid. Ashley: When we get our new place and have the extra room maybe we can get a girl. I think it would be nice to have a girl around.

item.title: Status Update – December 20, 2018
item.description: Dillan mailed letter to Grandpa Ave on way to school, pajama day, watched movies, Christmas Break. Mailed PAVA photos to Nicolle and Rebecca, cheaper than anticipated, will arrive tomorrow. Stalled truck on Hwy 37 delayed picking up kids. Lesa helped kids make gingerbread houses.

item.title: Status Update – October 18, 2018
item.description: Same old morning/workday/afternoon. Finished antibiotics, feel much better than a month ago, wish Lesa would get better too. Kids watched TV. Jordan finished PAVA pics, they’re awesome! Backgrounds and Facebook immediately! Spent evening ordering for Nicolle, Daniel, and Rebecca.

item.title: Status Update – July 1, 2018
item.description: Church with kids, Lesa stayed home again. Dillan’s birthday party, 9 years old, happy with gifts! Nicolle wrote Happy 10th on Facebook, doesn’t know his age. Swimming, even Lesa. Drove Ashley to Hilltop Camp, signed her in, said goodbyes, nervous but Marcy and Eleanor were there.

item.title: Status Update – April 27, 2018
item.description: I worked from Times-Mail until noon. Talked with Principle Hudson before Donuts with Dad with Dwyane, he made me a key chain, home with me after. Lesa grocery shopped. Viewed two houses, we liked one. Springville Store for pizza. Nicolle emailed, asked for advice in writing kids.

item.title: Status Update – April 26, 2018
item.description: Work trudging along. Realtor said majority of houses we like are gone, looking at two tomorrow. So far no repercussions from Dillan’s behavior yesterday. Man walking toward school with shotgun caused school lock down. Ate at Asian Pearl. Nicolle emailed, she received PAVA letter.

item.title: Status Update – April 25, 2018
item.description: Long, long day; finally finished working at 10:15pm. Emails from Nicolle asking about PAVA letter. Dillan in trouble at school, during art he got mad and in his notebook he had drawn 18 stick figures and wrote “Everyone’s dead in school but Dillan.” WTF‽ Talked with him, no clue.

item.title: Status Update – March 17, 2018
item.description: Up early, drove 1½ hours to Owensville, helped present Open Arms foster workshop, different, not sure we’ll do it again, on way drove by Nicolle and grandparents’ houses. Late lunch at Pizza Hut in Princeton, used Ashley and Dwyane’s reading vouchers. At home kids played outside.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – October 11, 2017
item.description: Ashley, talking about her bio-parents: They hurt Dillan more on the inside where you can’t see, and they hurt me more on the outside where you can see.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – February 27, 2017
item.description: Ashley, asking about our PAVA PO Box: Was anything in it?

item.title: Status Update – January 19, 2016
item.description: Another 2-hr school delay; more sub-zero temps/wind chills. While confirming CFTM tomorrow I learned it had been rescheduled at Nicolle’s request; I got pissed because I wasn’t notified. Pablo Bear visited from Mexico City tonight; spent the evening with Ashley; lots of pictures!

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – September 16, 2015
item.description: Dillan: Daddy? Dave: What? Dillan: Why do people keep giving us swimming pools? Dave: People give us things because they want to help us. Dillan: Why? Dave: People want to help us because they want to show God’s love through them, and because they know how expensive and hard it must be to take care of four kids that aren’t our kids yet, and because they want to make you kids feel better and have fun and not be sad.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – August 20, 2015
item.description: Ashley: My other mom and dad only fed us cereal and hot dogs. And Kathy fed us cereal and lots of stuff. And I like the stuff God feeds us. [Food from our garden.] And you feed us lots and lots of good stuff and I like it the best.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – August 4, 2015
item.description: [Dillan and I were sitting on the stairs at church. We were discussing why he was disruptive during Sunday School. He was biting his lower lip and his whole body was trembling. I could tell he wanted to tell me something but was afraid to. I put my arm around him to comfort him.] Dave: It’s okay Dillan. You can tell me. It will be okay. [Dillan remained quite and just looked at me.

item.title: Status Update – April 10, 2015
item.description: Mom and Dad Moffett declined self-termination. End of the school week. Pizza night. Nothing else special happened. Busy day tomorrow.

item.title: Status Update – April 8, 2015
item.description: Slow start again! Tornado siren was exciting for kids. Stephanie called and needs photos for possible self-termination by parents on Friday.
